case.title: Younger man? - 52 (NY)
case.text:
An amazing, Caucasian, overall sane, fit, attractive woman has completely gone mad and posted on CL. On a serious note, I am looking for an unattached man to date: in his 40-ies, who is tall, fit and would like to meet an exciting gal. No worries - I will not look older than you. (Hopefully, you don't have small children and are not planning to have more). No pressure - we'll take it slow and see if something good transpires.
Sense of humor is a must! Please, be SINGLE, over 5'11" and don't be afraid to attach your photo(clothes on, thank you). I will respond with mine.
